title: Icon :(
body:
So I have been playing League of Legends for a while now and am currently in Silver V. Recently Riot said that they would be giving out Riot Kayle as well as an icon for the awesome 10-year anniversary as long as you have played in the last few months. I got Riot Kayle but I didn't get my icon. I played over ten games that weekend waiting for my icon. This includes my 18-4 Ekko game with no "S". So could someone pls tell me why I haven't gotten my icon and/or how to solve this problem.


Thanks, :D
Matthew

replies.body: The gifts are being sent out individually, so you may not get it all at once.  We've updated our timeline per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) and are still distributing gifts.  Hang tight!

Greetings!

Getting the gifts out to everyone took a little longer than expected and Riot has announced that they are trying to hand out all gifts by September 30.




- Okuma
